house_listing.house_description: Price includes jetted tub, separate shower & double sinks in mbr bth.Gas fp & range,designer white appliances w/trash compactor & microwave.Lg sep.Dining rm.Walk in closets,vinyl windows & sprinkler system.Pool & pool house-energy saver homes.Builder pays cc-less pp and ff +1% pt.Site open 12-5pm
